titleStmt.title: The soveraignty of the British seas proved by records, history, and the municipall lawes of this kingdome / written in the yeare 1633, by that learned knight, Sr John Boroughs ...
titleStmt.author: Borough, John, Sir, d. 1643.

notesStmt.note: This item is identified as Wing B6129 at reel 885:20 and as Wing B3774 at reel 976:3 (number cancelled in Wing 2nd ed.).
